column1: '''Katie Jackson''' (born [[1996]]) is a New Zealand actress who portrayed as a Cute [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] Child
column3: and a [[Gondor]] Child in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'' trilogy and a Cute Young Hobbit
column5: and a [[Lake-town]] Woman in ''[[The Hobbit (film series)|The Hobbit]]'' trilogy.{{Fact}}

column1: She is the daughter of [[Peter Jackson]] and [[Fran Walsh]] and the sister of [[Billy Jackson]].
* [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' -  Hobbit Child
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' - Rohan Refugee Child
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - Child
* [[2012]]: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'' - Young Hobbit (Extended Edition only)
* [[2013]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' - [[Betsy Butterbur]]
* [[2014]]: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' - Girl in [[Lake-town]]
